channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Platform Symphony
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Platform Symphony

item.title: CVE-2018-1705|2024-09-16T16:17:42.804Z -- ibm -- platform%20symphony
item.description: IBM Platform Symphony 7.1 Fix Pack 1 and 7.1.1 and IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.1.2 and 7.2.0.2 contain an information disclosure vulnerability that could allow an authenticated attacker to obtain highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 146340.

item.title: CVE-2018-1704|2024-09-16T17:13:52.176Z -- ibm -- platform%20symphony
item.description: IBM Platform Symphony 7.1 Fix Pack 1 and 7.1.1 and IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.1.2 and 7.2.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 146339.
